title: World record-breaking e-bike launched globally
text:
World record-breaking e-bike launched globally Monday, March 05, 2018 - 01:34 
An electric bicycle which last October broke the world record for the longest distance covered on a single charge by an e-bike is about to be mass-produced, following a successful crowdfunding campaign. Roselle Chen reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
An electric bicycle which last October broke the world record for the longest distance covered on a single charge by an e-bike is about to be mass-produced, following a successful crowdfunding campaign. Roselle Chen reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2I6ZmvW
